moves.name: Flare Blitz
moves.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. The user sustains serious damage and may leave the target burned.

moves.name: Heat Wave
moves.description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing team. It may also leave targets with a burn.

moves.name: Dragon Claw
moves.description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.

moves.name: Shadow Claw
moves.description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Smokescreen
moves.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. It reduces the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Smokescreen
moves.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. It reduces the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Dragon Rage
moves.description: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its Speed stat.

moves.name: Fire Fang
moves.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it burned.

moves.name: Flame Burst
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

moves.name: Wing Attack
moves.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

moves.name: Inferno
moves.description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.

moves.name: Heat Wave
moves.description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing team. It may also leave targets with a burn.

moves.name: Flare Blitz
moves.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. The user sustains serious damage and may leave the target burned.
